item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: More KaTeX
item.description: The extensions mchem and copy-tex are also included (along the necessary auto-render). The mchem extension allows chemistry notation, like $$(\ce{H2O})$$ or: $$ \ce{x Na(NH4)HPO4 ->[\Delta] (NaPO3)_x + x NH3 ^ + x H2O} $$ While copy-tex allows users to copy the rendered KaTeX and paste it in its native format.
